snippet.title: Fantasia Re: Build (JP) Lina Inverse – Special Move Teaser
snippet.description:
⚜️ Character Info [Added on 20xx/xx/xx]
[Character] Lina Inverse
[キャラクター] リナ・インバース

[Anime] Slayers
[アニメ] スレイヤーズ

[Special Move] Dragon Slave (Dragon Rend Kill)
[必殺技] ドラグ・スレイブ〔竜破斬〕


▶️ Original Source
[Youtube] https://youtu.be/-MUCCp-3fiw


🎮 Game Info
[Title] Fantasia Re: Build
[タイトル] ファンタジア・リビルド

[Series] Fantasia Re: Build
[シリーズ] ファンタジア・リビルド

[Developer] DMM GAMES
[ゲームデベロッパー] DMM GAMES

[Publisher] DMM GAMES
[ゲームパブリッシャー] DMM GAMES

[Platform] Android and iOS
[プラットフォーム] アンドロイド ＆ アップル


📲 Digital Media Store (JP)
[Google Play] https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmm.games.fantasiarebuild 
[App Store] https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/id1529979794 


🌐 Official Website (JP)
[Homepage] https://project-frb.jp 
[Twitter] https://twitter.com/project_frb 


🎨 Artist Info
[Illustrator] Rui Araizumi
[イラストレーター] TBA 
[Twitter] https://twitter.com/TBA or N/A [will be update later]  
[Pixiv] https://pixiv.net/users/TBA or N/A [will be update later]


🎤 Voice Actor / Actress Info 
[Character Voice] Lina Inverse CV: Megumi Hayashibara
[声優] リナ・インバース CV: 林原めぐみ
[Animenewsnetwork] https://animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/people.php?id=391
